alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 3:50PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Albany County through 430 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woods Landing, or 24 miles southwest of Laramie, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woods Landing-Jelm and Woods Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range
